fif_core

Class OWA

  • java.lang.Object
    • fif_core.OWA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Aggregator

    public class OWA
extends java.lang.Object
implements Aggregator
    This class represents the ordered weighted averaging, a particular implementation of an aggregator.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Troiano Lorenzo

    • Constructor Detail

      • OWA

        public OWA(double... weights)
        The constructor sets an array of weights, used in aggregation algorithm.

        Preconditions:

        1-The array is not equal to null.
        2-The size of array is different from 0.
        3-Each number of the array should be between 0 and 1.

        Postconditions:

        1-The array of weights is set for the OWA object.

        Parameters:
        weights - The array of weights you want to set.

    • Method Detail

      • aggregate

        public double aggregate(double... values)
                 throws IllegalNumerOfValuesException
        This methods aggregate a sets of values, calculating the ordered weighted averaging.

        Preconditions:

        1-The array is not equal to null.
        2-The size of array must be equal to the size of weights.
        3-Each number of the array should be between 0 and 1.

        Postconditions:

        1-It's returned a calculated ordered weighted averaging value.

        Specified by:
        aggregate in interface Aggregator
        Parameters:
        values - The array of values you want to aggregate.
        Returns:
        the calculated value.
        Throws:
        IllegalNumerOfValuesException

        public double[] getOwa()
